entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.17-1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add code to switch from branch master to main by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2009

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.15-2...v2025.07.17-1

What's Changed

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.18-1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Make 'update_self' master switch to 'update_self' main if main branch exists by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2011
  • Add a notice saying DS is switching from branch master to main by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2012
  • Warn that we are overriding an explicit update to master to use `ma… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2013

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.17-2...v2025.07.18-1

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: 2025.07.19-1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Use global variables for the source and target branches for automatic… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2014
  • Show [<branch> Unknown Version] as the version in the GUI and `ds … by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2015

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.18-1...2025.07.19-1

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.20-1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Change call to git branch --show to use `git symbolic-ref --short H… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2017
  • Change git branch --show to ds_branch in update_self by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2018
  • Add option to toggle between line drawing and ascii characters. by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2019
  • Update command-line options for toggling line drawing and borders by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2020
  • Add Huntarr by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2021

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/2025.07.19-1...v2025.07.20-1
